overview.title: About PDFMaster
overview.description: PDFMaster is a comprehensive PDF manipulation tool. The application provides numerous features for working with PDF documents, from simple merging and splitting to advanced operations like adding watermarks or password protection.

features.title: Available Features
list: Merge multiple PDF files into one document
Split PDF at a specific page
Extract range of pages to new document

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: All API endpoints require a JWT token in the request header

merge.title: Merge PDFs
merge.description: Combines multiple PDF files into one document
merge.request:
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

PDF files: files[]
Output filename: outputName (optional)
merge.response:
Content-Type: application/pdf
The resulting merged PDF file

split.title: Split PDF
split.description: Splits a PDF document into two parts
split.request:
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

PDF file: pdf
Page number: splitAtPage
First part name: firstOutputName (optional)
Second part name: secondOutputName (optional)
split.response:
Content-Type: application/zip
Archive containing both PDF parts

removePage.title: Remove Page
removePage.description: Removes a specific page from the PDF document
removePage.request:
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

PDF file: pdf
Page number: pageToRemove
Output filename: outputName (optional)
removePage.response:
Content-Type: application/pdf
The resulting PDF file without the removed page

extractPages.title: Extract Pages
extractPages.description: Extracts selected pages from the PDF document
extractPages.request:
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

PDF file: pdf
Start page: startPage
End page: endPage
Output filename: outputName (optional)
extractPages.response:
Content-Type: application/pdf
The resulting PDF file with extracted pages

reorderPages.title: Reorder Pages
reorderPages.description: Rearranges pages in a PDF document
reorderPages.request:
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

PDF file: pdf
Page order: pageOrder (comma-separated page numbers)
Output filename: outputName (optional)
reorderPages.response:
Content-Type: application/pdf
PDF file with reordered pages

addPassword.title: Add Password
addPassword.description: Adds password protection to a PDF document
addPassword.request:
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

PDF file: pdf
Password: password
Output filename: outputName (optional)

removePassword.title: Remove Password
removePassword.description: Removes password protection from a PDF document
removePassword.request:
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

PDF file: pdf
Current password: password
Output filename: outputName (optional)

addWatermark.title: Add Watermark
addWatermark.description: Adds a watermark to a PDF document
addWatermark.request:
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

PDF file: pdf
Watermark text: text
Opacity: opacity (0-1)
Font size: fontSize
Color: color (hex)
Rotation angle: rotation
Output filename: outputName (optional)
addWatermark.response:
Content-Type: application/pdf
PDF file with watermark

toImages.title: Convert to Images
toImages.description: Converts PDF pages to PNG images
toImages.request:
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

PDF file: pdf
Resolution: dpi (optional)
toImages.response:
Content-Type: application/zip
Archive containing PNG images

rotatePages.title: Rotate Pages
rotatePages.description: Rotates specified pages in a PDF document
rotatePages.request:
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

PDF file: pdf
Pages: pages[]
Degrees: degrees[]
Output filename: outputName (optional)
rotatePages.response:
Content-Type: application/pdf
PDF with rotated pages
